Room.Name: Poor Alley
Room.ShortDescription: You are in Poor Alley, a place many people wish they would never see again.
Room.LongDescription: There;s a surprisingly large number of peoplw in this dark and cold alley. Many of them are going to a wine shop located down some stairs. Next door is a missionary. A group of missionary musicians stand outside, playing in a small band and loudly proclaiming that all sinners will go to hell and be eaten by Fenris. A fat lady in an ankle-length black dress bangs a tambourine against her ample hip, and wildly rolls her eyes as she sings.
